movie.title: The Avengers
movie.writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movie.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movie.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 38 wins & 79 nominations.
